settings.title: Flavour Profiles
settings.content:
Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc

The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc and Native Australian Finger Lime. Bright aroma of white nectarine and fresh cucumber. A crisp, lingering finish underpinned with herbaceous notes.

Kakadu Plum Rosé
The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc, Shiraz and Native Australian Kakadu Plum. A refreshing bouquet of just-ripe strawberry and subtle pink rose. A crisp, dry finish, with a hint of spice.

Pepperberry Shiraz 

The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Shiraz and Native Australian Pepperberry. Bursting with juicy red fruits and a hint of dark chocolate. A dry, smooth finish, with notes of vanilla and layered lingering spice.

Sparkling Brut

The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised wine and Native Australian Peach (Quandong), crafted in the style of a Sparkling Brut Chardonnay. A medley of summer fruit on the nose and palate, supported by crisp acidity and vanilla notes.

Sparkling Rosé

The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc, Shiraz and Native Australian Rosella, crafted in the style of a Sparkling Rosé. Layered notes of bright crunchy fruit, tart native Rosella and a hint of citrus. Crisp, lively bubbles with a dry finish.

Sparkling Sansgria

The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Shiraz andNative Australian Riberry, crafted in the style of a Sparkling Sangria. A fiesta of red fruit and citrus dance across the palate. A complex and refreshing finish with a hint of spice and vanilla.

La Vie En Rose - Crisp Rose Bubbles (no de-alcoholised wine)

The perfect blend of delicate Pink Rose Petals and the subtle tang of Hibiscus Flowers. Finished with crisp notes while lingering in the sweetness of Orange and Apple Tarte.

Le Blanc - Elegant White Bubbles (no de-alcoholised wine)

The perfect blend of vibrant Native Australian Forestberry, earthy roasted Wattleseed and crisp Apple. A light and refreshing finish with the lingering warmth of cayenne and dry Green Tea.

settings.title: Shipping Information
settings.content:
As you're joining our Wine Club, shipping is FREE!

Your order will be dispatched within 2 business days.

Please note all parcels are sent with an authority to leave in a safe place (no signature required). Please leave a note at checkout if a signature is required.

For further info, please see our shipping policy

settings.title: No added sugar
settings.text: No added sweeteners or grape juice concentrates either. Just delicious low calorie wines.

settings.title: better for you
settings.text: All our wines are vegan, gluten free and contain beautiful health-giving native ingredients.

settings.title: Made in australia
settings.text: We're a small, family business, passionate about one thing: making incredible non-alc. drinks.

settings.title: START WITH THE TASTER COLLECTION

settings.subtitle: HOW WE MAKE OUR
settings.title: NON ALC. WINES
settings.text: We remove the alcohol from premium Australian wine and blend it with beautiful botanicals and native Australian ingredients. We don't add any sugars or grape juice concentrate, so our wines are dry (not sweet). The result is a beautifully nuanced, complex non alcoholic drink that mimics the experience of a fine wine.

settings.subtitle: OUR STORY
settings.title: MEET THE FOUNDERS
settings.text:
We're Alan and Christina (Al-tina!), partners in business and life.

We used to enjoy a wine (or ten), but cut back for health reasons. We couldn't find a non-alc. drink we enjoyed, so decided to create one. We wanted something that wasn't full of sugars or artificial additives, and something that gave us the same experience as an alcoholic wine.

Christina is our scientist and has a Ph.D. in Plant Science and a Bachelor of Chemical Biotechnology. She's the one behind our innovative recipes and processes.

Alan is the driving force behind our national sales, making sure we're on shelves and menus around the country.

We've been making change in the non-alc. space since 2018 and look forward to helping you find your new favourite non-alcoholic alternative.

settings.title: Can I purchase without joining Wine Club?
settings.text:
Yes, you can find a Taster Collection here. But you'll miss out on the best pricing, free shipping and more.

You can cancel, swap or skip Wine Club orders anytime.

settings.title: What is ALTINA Wine Club?
settings.text:
We designed ALTINA Wine Club to give you the very best non-alcoholic wine experience.

You'll get member pricing, free shipping, and work through the tiers to get cash back, pay-it-forward gifts, and more.

Here at ALTINA we always strive to give you more, so here are some other perks of joining the club:

Community and Connection:

Engage with like-minded individuals through virtual tastings, an exclusive online forum, and members-only events.

Sustainability:
Embodying our commitment to sustainability, every ALTINA Wine Club order has a direct environmental impact. We contribute to initiatives such as planting trees and removing plastic from the environment. This is in addition to our regular sustainability practices like using recyclable packaging and offsetting carbon emissions on every online purchase.

Educational Content:
Receive curated newsletters packed with wellness tips, food pairing advice, and insights from industry experts.

settings.title: What are the Wine Club Tiers?
settings.text:
We've made it easy for you to automatically move up through our tiers base don the number of Wine Club orders you place.

Enthusiast (1-3 orders): For those new to their non-alcoholic wine subscription. Enjoy 15% off our RRP, free carbon-neutral shipping and guaranteed product availability.

Connoisseur (4-9 orders): Dive deeper into the ALTINA experience with all the benefits of the Enthusiast tier plus 5% cash back on every order, and a pay-it-forward bonus so you can share ALTINA with others.

Aficionado (10+ orders): For the ALTINA aficionado with 10 or more orders, receive all of the perks of the connoisseur level plus 10% cash back on every order and an annual gift to compliment your ALTINA experience.

settings.title: Can I really cancel, pause or skip whenever I want?
settings.text: Yes, you can skip as many months as you like, change your delivery frequency, swap the products you get each month and even cancel your subscription whenever you’d like. You are in complete control with your own personal dashboard. And we're always here to help with VIP support.
